value.stringValue: Your service request to Report and Replace Card was created

constants.description: Stores the address of the header image used in the email template.
constants.name: HeaderImageURL

decisions.description: Determines if the prerequisites to send an email are not available.
decisions.name: HavePrerequisitesToSendAnEmail
decisions.label: Have Prerequisites To Send An Email?

decisions.description: Determines whether the email associated with the Account is available or not.
decisions.name: IsAccountEmailAvailable
decisions.label: Is Account Email Available?

decisions.description: Determines whether a replacement card was ordered for the selected card and stores the card number.
decisions.name: OrderedReplacementforCard
decisions.label: Ordered Replacement for Card?

decisions.description: Determines which attribute is stored in the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop
decisions.name: SetWhichAttribute
decisions.label: Set Which Attribute?

Flow.description: Allows an agent to review the details of a customer's Report and Replace Card request.

formulas.description: Constructs the Account name by concatenating first and last name.
formulas.name: AccountNameFormula

formulas.description: Removes Square braces at the start and end of comma separated card numbers array
formulas.name: CardsSelectedFormula

formulas.description: Removes Square braces at the start and end of comma separated card numbers array
formulas.name: CardsSelectedForReplacementFormula

formulas.description: Convert the group number with decimal places formatted to text
formulas.name: OrderedReplacementFormula

formulas.description: Constructs the Shipping Address by concatenating address line 1, address line 2, city, state, country and postal code
formulas.name: ShippingAddressFormula

Flow.label: Review Report and Replace Card

loops.description: Iterates through Cards Selected and Ordered for Replacement
loops.name: IterateThroughCardsSelectedandOrderedForReplacement
loops.label: Iterate Through Cards Selected and Ordered flor Replacement

loops.description: Iterates through Service Catalog Request Extended Attribute Values from GetServiceCatalogRequestExtendedAttributes.
loops.name: IterateThroughServiceCatalogRequests
loops.label: Iterate Through Service Catalog Requests

recordLookups.description: Gets the service catalog request extended attribute value records with a CaseServiceProcessId matching the serviceCatalogRequestId that was passed into the flow. Stores the results in the Service Catalog Request Extended Attribute Values from GetServiceCatalogRequests record collection.
recordLookups.name: GetServiceCatalogRequestExtendedAttributes
recordLookups.label: Get Service Catalog Request Extended Attributes

textTemplates.description: Stores the body of the email thatâ€™s sent when a case is created.
textTemplates.name: EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!AccountName},
Your service request to Report and Replace Card(s) was created and your case number is {!CaseNumber}.

Request Summary:
Selected cards for blocking: {!CardsSelectedFormula}
Reason for blocking: {!Reason}
Remarks: {!Remarks}
Selected cards for replacement: {!CardsSelectedForReplacementFormula}
Shipping preference: {!ShippingPreference}
Shipping address: {!ShippingAddressFormula}

Thank you,
Customer Support Team
